remarks: Reciprocal is one-to-one.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 3-Mar-2020.)
statement:
divcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divap0d.3 $e |- ( ph -> A # 0 ) $.
divap0d.4 $e |- ( ph -> B # 0 ) $.
rec11d.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( 1 / A ) = ( 1 / B ) ) $.
rec11apd $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
